original_text: Those things are the Holy Spirit, the water of Jesus' baptism and the blood of his death on the cross. These all show us the same thing, that Jesus came from God.
korean_text: 성령과 물과 피라 또한 이 셋은 합하여 하나이니라

sentences.original_text: Those things are the Holy Spirit
and the blood of his death on the cross
These all show us the same thing
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들은 모두 우리에게 동일한 것을 보여줍니다
